attributes.action: Vaccinated travellers from red list countries should not quarantine in hotels
attributes.additional_details: If both double vaccinated and unvaccinated travellers are treated the same, it means covid vaccination is not effective.
attributes.background: UK Government should allow at least double vaccinated people arriving from red list countries to isolate in their individual houses for 10 days and taking the PCR tests on Day 2 and Day 8. The normal red list rules should then apply to unvaccinated travellers.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588072

The Petitions Committee has scheduled a debate on the above petition on Monday 17 January 2022.
